42.1.hd_quote: The ability when surplus resources are available to extend one's activities beyond their normal scope.
42.1.behavioral_axis: Knows growth begins by not repeating the same experience; branches to new cycles when there is energy.
42.1.shadow_axis: Scatters sacral energy into too many half-finished experiences → 'decadence'.

42.2.hd_quote: Recognition and acute capitalization of trends.
42.2.behavioral_axis: Projects, 'I can grow with this,' and rides collective trends into increase.
42.2.shadow_axis: Overidentifies with trends it cannot actually resource; stops growth when change hits.

42.3.hd_quote: Mistakes are a natural part of the process.
42.3.behavioral_axis: Accepts that growth = messy cycles; keeps moving through experience despite errors.
42.3.shadow_axis: Broods over mistakes; becomes overly cautious and blocks maturation.

42.4.hd_quote: The quintessential manifestation of the mediator.
42.4.behavioral_axis: Mediates resources so others can complete their cycles; knows experience needs company.
42.4.shadow_axis: Overconcern with harmony distorts mediation and slows growth.

42.5.hd_quote: The fulfillment and actualization of purpose as a natural path.
42.5.behavioral_axis: Appears mature → is entrusted with resources → fulfills purpose through growth.
42.5.shadow_axis: Turns growth inward and reclusive; withholds energy from collective increase.

42.6.hd_quote: The power to share the process of growth with others.
42.6.behavioral_axis: From the roof, chooses when growth is worth transmitting; shares mature experience.
42.6.shadow_axis: Refuses to share gains; materialistic protection of energy → aggression from others.
